name: Privacy Settings
description: Check your privacy settings. Very carefully, and reasonably regularly

name: Don't trust social media
description: Don’t put too much trust in privacy settings. There’s often a way for people to get round them. Instead, for everything you post, think “would I mind if this ever became public?”

name: Don't publicize personal data
description: Don’t give away too many personal details. It can leave you vulnerable to social engineering

name: 3rd-party apps
description: Watch out for third-party apps and integrations. Only connect apps from reputable publishers to your social accounts, and don’t give them permissions or data access that they don’t need. Unlink apps that you are no longer using

name: Monitor Accounts
description: Monitor accounts for suspicious activity, such as logins that you don’t recognise, changes in settings, or general activity that wasn’t you.
